Text: A surprise visitor all the more.
I've had eyes on you for a while.
But who is this secret peeper
You're not good-natured or helpful, are you?
And yet you are here for our help.
Do you not have errand boys where you come from?
They lacked your valuable set of skills.
It is not money we thirst for, per se.
There is plenty that you do thirst for.
Assassination on behalf of the Kingdom of Nilfgaard.
Or perhaps another eye or ear to round out your artful composition.
We'd planned on wearing this one for a while.
A cell of dimeritium made just for you.
How does it feel to be neutered of your powers?
I know how you were schooled,
The White Flame made me who I am...
if only you realized that Cintra had to fall.
when you thought to take your life.
He didn't want to be abused.
He didn't want to be used.  [chuckles]
You can't change the world this way.
Only one of us will be alive to find out.
You don't know what you're doing.
You don't know what she is.
She will end up where she belongs.
You're to bring me the girl alive.
I've never been shy a day in my life.
My rates have gone up since last we spoke.
I've found more demand for my services.
Then your customers will be awfully disappointed
when they find a charred spot where you once stood.
Not being bound by the rules of the Brotherhood.
Living off the grid with no resources.
Mm. It's a dream come true.
Lucky for you, you found your way to an intolerant kingdom.
For quick coin, head to the nearest town in any direction.
If it's as you say, then why aren't you out there taking advantage?
[Hemet]  I see a lot of myself in you.
Find a whole new career to fund what you...
There is no us." There's only me."
And I know a thing or two about stirring word of mouth.
Love, that's nice, but not on the cards for me.
It took me nearly a whole one to find him.
As you can see, passion is not the trouble.
my... issue is of a mechanical nature.
The spell should take effect quickly,
and will endure until your lady utters a handpicked magic word.
You arrived at that rather quickly.
Did you not understand the sign?
Are you familiar with who I am?
Well, won't you end this rather melodramatic suspense and tell me?
Perhaps you are not aware  of the rules here?
I need to collect what's due to the kingdom.
I'm afraid those terms seem rather shite to me.
I did suspect you possessed such a predilection.
[Dryad General, in Elder] We can't trust her.
She hid her identity, her past,
Shan-Kayan is the only reason we know who she is.
Perhaps she can't yet trust us.
We still don't know her intent.
Who possesses the power of a weapon.
In Brokilon, she can be molded.
She can become one of us.
Their whole army will arrive. It's only a matter of time.
I don't think they like me.
When Queen Calanthe closed the borders of Cintra,
it was to protect her people.
The General wants to protect us.
The sword of destiny has two edges.
You can stay. Or you can continue on your search.
What do you want to do?
[Jaskier] ♪ 'Cause you all know That this bard ♪
What's it been, months? Years? What is time, anyway?
I heard you were in town.
Are you following me, you scamp?
I mean, I'm flattered and everything,
but you should really think about getting a hobby one of these days.
How are you doing?" I hear you ask.
my muse and beauty of this world,
Again. Rather coldly and unexpectedly, I might add.
I fear I shall die a brokenhearted man.
Or a hungry one, at the very least,
unless somebody fancies sharing a fish with an old friend?
Oh, are we not using friend"?"
Yeah, sure.  Let's just give it another decade.
Geralt, you're fantastic at a great many things,
but clearly, fishing is not one of them.
What are you fishing for, exactly?
I'm just-- I'm just listing fish that I know.
What's going on, Geralt? Talk to me.
For a dj-- For a djinn?  A dj-- Like a genie?
[laughs] The floaty fellas with the... the bad tempers
and the banned magics, that kind of genie?
I don't mean to play priest's ear or anything,
but has it occurred to you that maybe we're merely rubbing salve on a tumor?
Not exactly addressing the root cause of the problem?
I mean, maybe, just-- just maybe,
has got something to do with what  the druid Mousesack said to you in Cintra?
You know, the Law of Surprise?
Being unable to escape the child that belongs to you, et cetera, et cetera?
You know, the Countess de Stael once said to me
that destiny is just the embodiment of the soul's desire to grow.
Did you sing to her before she left?
We are so having this conversation. Come on, Geralt. Tell me. Be honest.
It's like ordering a pie and finding it has no filling.
I mean, are you trying to hurt my feelings, Geralt? It's...
It's down-- downright indecorous of you, if I'm completely honest, and--
[stammers] Wow. Wow.  What is-- what is that?
Take it back about my fillingless pie.
Take it back, you get your djinny-djinn-djinn.
No! No, let go, you horse's arse!
That's a bit of an anticlimax.
Djinn, I have freed thee, and as of this day, I am thy lord.
Firstly, may Valdo Marx, the troubadour of Cidaris,
be struck down with apoplexy and die.
Secondly, the Countess de Stael must welcome me back with glee,
open arms and very little clothing.
Oh, come on, you always say you want nothing from life.
How was I to know you wanted three wishes all to yourself?
I just want some damn peace!
Yes, yes. Chireadan, the elf healer.
A djinn in a bottle?  It's like a fairy tale.
Without the happy ending. Can you help him?
I assure you I have received the best medical education
these injuries are of a magical nature.
I can help with the pain, but it's a bit like...
If the spell's action isn't halted as soon as possible,
[Chireadan] And the longer he goes untreated,
the more likely it is to spread.
Yeah, we won't let that happen.
The medicine should buy him a few hours, but he needs a magical remedy.
You'll have to take him to another town.
The mayor says they are dangerous.
was tasked with bringing this mage to justice.
But I was unable to penetrate certain defenses.
The mayor himself has made the catch and has imprisoned the mage in his house.
That wasn't so fucking hard, was it?
The mage is powerful and malicious.
My dear, you still think there's a difference.
I haven't seen you for years.
Not since you maneuvered your way onto Aedirn's court.
King Virfuril is fine, I'm sure.
Down south, Fringilla's thrived in the post that should've been yours.
The rightful heir returned to Nilfgaard and she's helped him restore peace.
[Tissaia] You remained hidden for a while,
The so-called mages you're enlisting will not help you with your problem.
And if you're not careful, you will become just like them... irrelevant.
You are pure chaos right now.
You want a cure, and it's making you sloppy.
The Brotherhood left you to your own devices
flaunted in direct conflict with their agenda,
How can I ever repay you?
You knew the cost of enchantment.
But I didn't know what it would mean to me.
What does it mean to you?
Why do you want a baby?
Just because you don't know of a cure doesn't mean there isn't one.
It is time to move on.
Aretuza might be everything to you, but I'd rather forget it.
Aretuza is everything to the Continent,
to offer you a chance for redemption.
Aedirn, all of this nonsense, will be forgiven and forgotten.
You can use your talents to shape a new generation.
The great Tissaia wants my help?
Only you can be thrown a lifeline and think that you are saving me.
You're afraid I'll be everything you could never be...
You only want me to do well so long as you had your hand in it.
How did we get this way?
I gave you all I could give.
I have business to attend to.
A fee to see the mayor? This is urgent.
Not exactly what I was expecting.
Sorry, he's in a bad way.
Is there a mage that lives here?
I don't understand. Does he want me to get him the apple juice?
What did he fail to mention?
I thought you'd have fangs or horns or something.
First time I've seen a witcher up close.
What little spells can you cast with your hands?
I'll indulge your curiosity all night long.
But I'm sure we can find a way to fill the time.
He was attacked by a djinn.
You'll have to do better than juice.
He's in a deep healing sleep.
How long will he sleep for?
Long enough for you to bathe.
And I hardly think bathing in this house is going to leave me any cleaner.
I can not only guess the age and breed of your horse,
[Yennefer] Fishing for a djinn seems an extreme measure
And yet you didn't ask me to help with that.
Looming death kind of jumped the queue.
Now I'm wondering if I can afford you.
Have I accidentally agreed to indentured servitude?
but I'd hardly say we're blessed.
Thank you. Made for a magical childhood.
Happy childhoods make for dull company.
Judging by your wrists and your wits,
But Aretuza fixed you up nicely.
Tell me, are there women who find this coarseness charming?
Maybe some place where they find your coin very charming indeed.
Hm. You seem to find coin pretty charming yourself.
Clearly capitalizing on the political situation here.
I'm serving the stifled people of this town.
It's fine to fly in the face of overzealous authority,
but to pretend it's anything other than making a profit...
And to pretend you're after a djinn to cure insomnia?
once I've paid for your kind services,
it'll be none of your concern.
I've determined your company and conversation payment enough.
I believe I sized you up quite right.
I said some things to him.
I'd like it not to be the last thing he remembers.
He won't remember much if he's dead.
But don't reproach yourself for it, Yennefer.
It's the sign from the seal.
If you wake him before he's healed,
That's no way to treat a friend,
The djinn is tied to this plane and its master.
How many wishes did the bard express before he lost his voice?
You need Jaskier to make his last wish so you can capture it.
If you try and bend it--
Tough to get in your head.
but you can't contend with me.
Sorry I couldn't be direct, I knew you'd fight it.
And I do love a good old-fashioned trap.
At the spa.  Where do you think we are?
I hope your rampage was well worth it.
attacked a pawnbroker in his shop,
kicking him in the delicate places.
You also dragged the apothecary into the street,
pulled down his pants and thrashed his arse with a belt.
Both are on the town council,
who are voting to usurp the mayor and kick Yennefer out.
Any of this ring a bell?
She had you enact revenge on her behalf.
but the guards assumed I was there to abet.
The sentence will be passed by the very council members you attacked.
It is sure to be death.
I suppose that's one way of getting some rest.
Why on earth would you enlist the mage's help after my warning?
It's like you thought the scorpion  were prettier than a spider
I admit I could've better prepared you for Yennefer.
You're under her spell, aren't you?
I wish I was, but no.
It's a simple issue of body chemistry.
And I think perhaps you may understand me.
I thought it would take longer to build the scaffold.
Did not know you were a witcher.
I've always wanted to play with one.
Definitely did not butter that biscuit.
but I've just remembered I left my... cat
I-- I really must be going.
Express your deepest desires and you can be on your way.
Well, my deepest desires are currently satisfied, thank you so much.
Perhaps you should try some scales.
♪ Toss a coin to your witcher ♪
If you want to keep all you have...
[guard] What's the difference between a witcher and a tub of dung?
I want you to burst, you son of a whore.
You are the one with the wishes.
I don't-- I don't know! I...
I wish very badly to leave this place forever.
Oh, Geralt. Thank the gods. I might live to see another day.
I'm glad to hear that you give a monkey's about it.
Well, I was having a rather lovely dream which then turned into a nightmare.
There were naked women in both parts.
The first one was loving, tender, very generous.
Tell me about the second one.
Well, black hair, devilish eyes, was painting an amphora on her abdomen.
She wants to be the vessel.
What, you know this woman? Of course you know this woman.
She wants to become more powerful.
Well, let's pray for her on our way out of town.
Are you perhaps short of a marble?
You have to go in there, don't you?
I recognize the look. I know how you feel.
Oh, no, no, no, no, no. Do not tell me that this is finally the moment
you've decided to actually care about someone other than yourself?
Leave the very sexy but insane witch to her inevitable demise!
She saved your life, Jaskier. I can't let her die.
You seem to want to meet your end.
The bard expressed his last wish,
That's because I'm the one with the wishes.
Well, what are you waiting for? [screams]
Becoming the vessel for the djinn will have you lose control,
Can't you see what this is doing to you?
I'll give you my last wish!
permitting my success so long as you command it yourself.
Damn it, Yennefer! Tell me what you want!
Sir, what's going on in that house?
[in distorted voice] Make your wish! You can have anything you want!
You could choose not to be a witcher.
[Chireadan] Are you sure they were up there?
She could not have survived it.
Why did Geralt go in there? It doesn't make any sense.
What, to save a mad fucking witch? Why?
Who knows what havoc it'll wreak now that it has no vessel at all?
Djinns are only dark creatures when held captive.
How can you be so sure?
When did you last feel happy when you felt trapped?
And if you were going to portal us to safety,
you could've taken us out of this shit town!
A fine critique if you could make a portal yourself.
It wasn't a shit town,  it was fine till you came along.
What am I supposed to do now, hm?
It wasn't supposed to go this way.
so that everyone remembers who you were,
for the rest of my days.
He always said I had the most wonderful singing voice.
You do know something of pleasure.
I was right about you too.
There was a number of things. Which part?
You were making it up as you went along.
[Eithne, in Elder] Who enters our forest?
[Dryad General, in Elder]  He claims he knows the child.
Dara, this is Mousesack. He's known me since I was born. He's like...
Where did you go on that street?
What matters is I've found my way back to you.
I've come to take you to your rightful place.
Ciri has chosen to stay with us.
It was her grandmother's dying wish
that she should go to Geralt of Rivia.
I know where to find him.
She's been promised to him through the Law of Surprise.
You've been so kind to me,
but Mousesack is all I have left of home.
he's the other edge of my destiny.
And you can come with us.
You're my family too now, remember?
in your own hands and no one else's.
